original: Netti
analyzed: na itti

original: Paṭiniddesavāra
analyzed: paṭiniddesa vāra

original: Vibhaṅga 11
analyzed: vibhaṅga

original: Paññattihāravibhaṅga
analyzed: paññatti hāra vibhaṅga

original: Tattha katamo paññattihāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ paññatti hāro

original: “Ekaṁ bhagavā dhammaṁ paññattīhi vividhāhi desetī”ti.
analyzed: ekam bhagavā dhammam paññattīhi vividhāhi deseti iti

original: Yā pakatikathāya desanā.
analyzed: yā pakati kathāya desanā

original: Ayaṁ nikkhepapaññatti.
analyzed: ayam nikkhepa paññatti

original: Kā ca pakatikathāya desanā, cattāri saccāni.
analyzed: kā ca pakati kathāya desanā cattāri saccāni

original: Yathā bhagavā āha—
analyzed: yathā bhagavān āha

original: “idaṁ dukkhan”ti ayaṁ paññatti pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ channaṁ dhātūnaṁ aṭṭhārasannaṁ dhātūnaṁ dvādasannaṁ āyatanānaṁ dasannaṁ indriyānaṁ nikkhepapaññatti.
analyzed: idam dukkhanti ayam paññatti pañcannam khandhānam channam dhātūnam aṭṭhārasannam dhātūnam dvādasannam āyatanānam dasannam indriyānam nikkhepa paññatti

original: Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṁ tattha viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ.
analyzed: kabaḷīkāre ce bhikkhave āhāre atthi rāgaḥ atthi nandī atthi taṇhā patiṭṭhitam tattha viññāṇam virūḷha

original: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
analyzed: yattha patiṭṭhitam viññāṇam virūḍha atthi tattha nāma rūpassa avakkanti

original: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
analyzed: yattha atthi nāma rūpassa avakkanti atthi tattha saṅkhārānam vuddhi

original: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
analyzed: yattha atthi saṅkhārānam vuddhi atthi tattha āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti

original: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yattha atthi āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti atthi tattha āyatim jāti jarā maraṇa

original: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, sasokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, sadaraṁ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
analyzed: yattha atthi āyatim jāti jarā maraṇa sa sokam bhikkhave sa daram sa upāyāsanti vadāmi

original: Phasse ce …pe…
analyzed: phasse ce pe

original: manosañcetanāya ce, bhikkhave, āhāre.
analyzed: manaḥ sañcetanāya ce bhikkhave āhāre

original: Viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṁ tattha viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ.
analyzed: viññāṇe ce bhikkhave āhāre atthi rāgaḥ atthi nandī atthi taṇhā patiṭṭhitam tattha viññāṇam virūḷha

original: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
analyzed: yattha patiṭṭhitam viññāṇam virūḍha atthi tattha nāma rūpassa avakkanti

original: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
analyzed: yattha atthi nāma rūpassa avakkanti atthi tattha saṅkhārānam vuddhi

original: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
analyzed: yattha atthi saṅkhārānam vuddhi atthi tattha āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti

original: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yattha atthi āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti atthi tattha āyatim jāti jarā maraṇa

original: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, sasokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, sadaraṁ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
analyzed: yattha atthi āyatim jāti jarā maraṇa sa sokam bhikkhave sa daram sa upāyāsanti vadāmi

original: Ayaṁ pabhavapaññatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa ca.
analyzed: ayam dukkhassa ca samudayassa ca

original: Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo natthi nandī natthi taṇhā, appatiṭṭhitaṁ tattha viññāṇaṁ avirūḷhaṁ.
analyzed: kabaḷīkāre ce bhikkhave āhāre natthi rāgaḥ natthi nandī natthi taṇhā a patiṭṭhitam tattha viññāṇam a virūḍha

original: Yattha appatiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ avirūḷhaṁ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
analyzed: yattha appatiṭṭhitam viññāṇam a virūḍha natthi tattha nāma rūpassa avakkanti

original: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
analyzed: yattha natthi nāma rūpassa avakkanti natthi tattha saṅkhārānam vuddhi

original: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
analyzed: yattha natthi saṅkhārānam vuddhi natthi tattha āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti

original: Yattha natthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yattha na atthi āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti natthi tattha āyatim jāti jarā maraṇa

original: Yattha natthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, asokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, adaraṁ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.
analyzed: yattha natthi āyatim jāti jarā maraṇa a sokam bhikkhave adaram vadāmi

original: Phasse ce …pe…
analyzed: phasse ce pe

original: manosañcetanāya ce, bhikkhave, āhāre.
analyzed: manaḥ sañcetanāya ce bhikkhave āhāre

original: Viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo natthi nandī natthi taṇhā, appatiṭṭhitaṁ tattha viññāṇaṁ avirūḷhaṁ.
analyzed: viññāṇe ce bhikkhave āhāre natthi rāgaḥ natthi nandī natthi taṇhā a patiṭṭhitam tattha viññāṇam a virūḍha

original: Yattha appatiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ avirūḷhaṁ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
analyzed: yattha appatiṭṭhitam viññāṇam a virūḍha natthi tattha nāma rūpassa avakkanti

original: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
analyzed: yattha natthi nāma rūpassa avakkanti natthi tattha saṅkhārānam vuddhi

original: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
analyzed: yattha natthi saṅkhārānam vuddhi natthi tattha āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti

original: Yattha natthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yattha na atthi āyatim punabbhava abhinibbatti natthi tattha āyatim jāti jarā maraṇa

original: Yattha natthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, asokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, adaraṁ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.
analyzed: yattha natthi āyatim jāti jarā maraṇa a sokam bhikkhave adaram vadāmi

original: Ayaṁ pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
analyzed: ayam pariññā paññatti dukkhassa pahāna paññatti samudayassa bhāvanā paññatti maggassa sacchikiriyā paññatti nirodhassa

original: Samādhiṁ, bhikkhave, bhāvetha.
analyzed: samādhi bhikkhave bhāvetha

original: Appamatto nipako sato, samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: appamattaḥ nipakaḥ sataḥ samāhitaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Kiñca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti?
analyzed: kiñca yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “Cakkhu aniccan”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: cakkhu aniccanti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “Rūpā aniccā”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti “cakkhuviññāṇaṁ aniccan”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: rūpā aniccā ati yathābhūtam pajānāti cakkhu viññāṇam aniccanti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “Cakkhusamphasso anicco”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: cakkhu samphassaḥ aniccaḥ ti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, tampi aniccanti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: yat pi idam cakkhu samphassa paccayā uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tam pi aniccanti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Sotaṁ …pe…
analyzed: sotam pe

original: ghānaṁ …
analyzed: ghānam

original: jivhā …
analyzed: jivhā

original: kāyo …
analyzed: kāyaḥ

original: “mano anicco”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: manaḥ aniccaḥ iti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “Dhammā aniccā”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: dhammāḥ aniccā ati yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “Manoviññāṇaṁ aniccan”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇam aniccanti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “Manosamphasso anicco”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: manaḥ samphassaḥ aniccaḥ iti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, tampi aniccanti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: yat pi idam manaḥ samphassa paccayā uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tam pi aniccanti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Ayaṁ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
analyzed: ayam bhāvanā paññatti maggassa pariññā paññatti dukkhassa pahāna paññatti samudayassa sacchikiriyā paññatti nirodhassa

original: Rūpaṁ, rādha, vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha, paññāya taṇhakkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
analyzed: rūpa rādha vikiratha vidhamatha viddhasetha vikīḷaniyam karotha paññāya taṇha khayāya paṭipajjatha

original: Taṇhakkhayā dukkhakkhayo, dukkhakkhayā nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: taṇhā khayā dukkha kkhayaḥ dukkha kkhayā nibbāna

original: Vedanaṁ …pe…
analyzed: vedanam pe

original: saññaṁ …
analyzed: saññam

original: saṅkhāre viññāṇaṁ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha, paññāya taṇhakkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
analyzed: saṅkhāre viññāṇam vikiratha vidhamatha viddhasetha vikīḷaniyam karotha paññāya taṇha khayāya paṭipajjatha

original: Taṇhakkhayā dukkhakkhayo, dukkhakkhayā nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: taṇhā khayā dukkha kkhayaḥ dukkha kkhayā nibbāna

original: Ayaṁ nirodhapaññatti nirodhassa, nibbidāpaññatti assādassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
analyzed: ayam nirodha paññatti nirodhassa nibbidā paññatti assādassa pariññā paññatti dukkhassa pahāna paññatti samudayassa bhāvanā paññatti maggassa sacchikiriyā paññatti nirodhassa

original: “So idaṁ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, “ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
analyzed: saḥ idam dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam dukkha samudayaḥ iti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “ayaṁ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti “ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti
analyzed: ayam dukkha nirodho ti yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati

original: yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Ayaṁ paṭivedhapaññatti saccānaṁ, nikkhepapaññatti dassanabhūmiyā, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti sotāpattiphalassa.
analyzed: ayaṃ paṭivedha paññatti saccāna nikkhepa paññatti dassana bhūmiyā bhāvanā paññatti maggassa sacchikiriyā paññatti sotāpatti phalassa

original: “So ime āsavā”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, “ayaṁ āsavasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, “ayaṁ āsavanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: saḥ ime āsavāḥ ati yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam āsava samudayaḥ iti yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam āsava nirodhaḥ iti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “Ayaṁ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: āsava nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: “Ime āsavā asesaṁ nirujjhantī”ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: ime āsavāḥ asesam nirujjhanti iti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Ayaṁ uppādapaññatti khaye ñāṇassa, okāsapaññatti anuppāde ñāṇassa, bhāvanāpaññatti
analyzed: ayam uppāda paññatti khaye ñāṇassa okāsa paññatti anuppāde ñāṇassa bhāvanā paññatti

original: maggassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, ārambhapaññatti
analyzed: maggassa pariññā paññatti dukkhassa pahāna paññatti samudayassa ārambha paññatti

original: vīriyindriyassa, āhaṭanāpaññatti āsāṭikānaṁ, nikkhepapaññatti bhāvanābhūmiyā, abhinighātapaññatti
analyzed: vīriya indriyassa āhaṭanā paññatti āsāṭikāna nikkhepa paññatti bhāvanā bhūmiyā abhinighāta paññatti

original: pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ.
analyzed: pāpakānam akusalānam dhammāna

original: Idaṁ “dukkhan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
analyzed: idam dukkhanti me bhikkhave pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi ālokaḥ udapādi

original: Ayaṁ “dukkhasamudayo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: ayam dukkha samudayaḥ ti me bhikkhave pe

original: ayaṁ “dukkhanirodho”ti me, bhikkhave ….
analyzed: ayam dukkha nirodho ti me bhikkhave

original: Ayaṁ “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
analyzed: ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati me bhikkhave pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi ālokaḥ udapādi

original: Ayaṁ desanāpaññatti saccānaṁ, nikkhepapaññatti sutamayiyā paññāya sacchikiriyāpaññatti anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa, pavattanāpaññatti dhammacakkassa.
analyzed: ayam desanā paññatti nikkhepa paññatti suta mayiyā paññāya sacchikiriyā paññatti anañña atañña ssāmi iti indriyassa pavattanā paññatti dhammacakkassa

original: “Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ pariññeyyan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
analyzed: tam kho panidam dukkham pariññeyyanti me bhikkhave pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi ālokaḥ udapādi

original: “So kho panāyaṁ dukkhasamudayo pahātabbo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: so kho pana ayam dukkha samudayaḥ pahātabbaḥ ti me bhikkhave pe

original: “so kho panāyaṁ dukkhanirodho sacchikātabbo”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: saḥ kho pana ayam dukkha nirodho sacchikātabbaḥ ti me bhikkhave pe

original: “sā kho panāyaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvetabbā”ti me, bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
analyzed: sā kho pana ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā bhāvetabbā ati me bhikkhave pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi ālokaḥ udapādi

original: Ayaṁ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, nikkhepapaññatti cintāmayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti aññindriyassa.
analyzed: ayam bhāvanā paññatti maggassa nikkhepa paññatti cintā mayiyā paññāya sacchikiriyā paññatti aññindriyassa

original: “Taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ pariññātan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
analyzed: tat kho panidam dukkham pariññātanti me bhikkhave pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi ālokaḥ udapādi

original: “So kho panāyaṁ dukkhasamudayo pahīno”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: saḥ kho pana ayam dukkha samudayaḥ pahīno ti me bhikkhave pe

original: so kho panāyaṁ dukkhanirodho sacchikato”ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: saḥ kho pana ayam dukkha nirodho sacchikato ti me bhikkhave pe

original: “sā kho panāyaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvitā”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
analyzed: sā kho pana ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā bhāvitā ati me bhikkhave pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi ālokaḥ udapādi

original: Ayaṁ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, nikkhepapaññatti bhāvanāmayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti aññātāvino indriyassa, pavattanāpaññatti dhammacakkassa.
analyzed: ayam bhāvanā paññatti maggassa nikkhepa paññatti bhāvanā mayiyā paññāya sacchikiriyā paññatti aññātāvino indriyassa pavattanā paññatti dhammacakkassa

original: “Tulamatulañca sambhavaṁ,
analyzed: tulam atulam ca sambhava

original: Bhavasaṅkhāramavassaji muni;
analyzed: bhava saṅkhāram avassaji muni

original: Ajjhattarato samāhito,
analyzed: ajjhattaratas samāhitaḥ

original: Abhindi kavacamivattasambhavan”ti.
analyzed: abhindi

original: “Tulan”ti saṅkhāradhātu.
analyzed: tulanti saṅkhāra dhātu

original: “Atulan”ti nibbānadhātu, “tulamatulañca sambhavan”ti abhiññāpaññatti sabbadhammānaṁ.
analyzed: atulanti nibbāna dhātu tulam atulañca sambhavanti abhiññā paññatti sabba dhammāna

original: Nikkhepapaññatti dhammapaṭisambhidāya.
analyzed: nikkhepa paññatti dhamma paṭisambhidāya

original: “Bhavasaṅkhāramavassaji munī”ti pariccāgapaññatti samudayassa.
analyzed: bhava saṅkhāram avassaji muni iti pariccāga paññatti samudayassa

original: Pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa.
analyzed: pariññā paññatti dukkhassa

original: “Ajjhattarato samāhito”ti bhāvanāpaññatti kāyagatāya satiyā.
analyzed: ajjhattaratas samāhitaḥ ti bhāvanā paññatti kāya gatāya satiyā

original: Ṭhitipaññatti cittekaggatāya.
analyzed: ṭhiti paññatti citta ekagga tāya

original: “Abhindi kavacamivattasambhavan”ti abhinibbidāpaññatti cittassa, upādānapaññatti sabbaññutāya, padālanāpaññatti avijjaṇḍakosānaṁ.
analyzed: abhindi abhinibbidā paññatti cittassa upādāna paññatti sabbaññu tāya padālanā paññatti

original: Tenāha bhagavā “tulamatulañca sambhavan”ti.
analyzed: tena āha bhagavā tulam atulam ca sambhavanti

original: “Yo dukkhamaddakkhi yatonidānaṁ,
analyzed: yaḥ dukkham addakkhi yatonidāna

original: Kāmesu so jantu kathaṁ nameyya;
analyzed: kāmesu saḥ jantu katham nameyya

original: Kāmā hi loke saṅgoti ñatvā,
analyzed: kāmāḥ hi loke ñatvā

original: Tesaṁ satīmā vinayāya sikkhe”ti.
analyzed: tesam sati imā vinayāya sikkha iti

original: “Yo dukkhan”ti vevacanapaññatti ca dukkhassa pariññāpaññatti ca.
analyzed: yaḥ dukkhan ti vevacana paññatti ca dukkhassa pariññā paññatti ca

original: “Yatonidānan”ti pabhavapaññatti ca samudayassa pahānapaññatti ca.
analyzed: yatonidāna nti pabhava paññatti ca samudayassa pahāna paññatti ca

original: “Addakkhī”ti vevacanapaññatti ca ñāṇacakkhussa paṭivedhapaññatti ca.
analyzed: addakkhi iti vevacana paññatti ca ñāṇa cakkhussa paṭivedha paññatti ca

original: “Kāmesu so jantu kathaṁ nameyyā”ti vevacanapaññatti ca kāmataṇhāya abhinivesapaññatti ca.
analyzed: kāmesu saḥ jantu katham nameyya ati vevacana paññatti ca kāma taṇhāya abhinivesa paññatti ca

original: “Kāmā hi loke saṅgoti ñatvā”ti paccatthikato dassanapaññatti kāmānaṁ.
analyzed: kāmāḥ hi loke saṅgā ti ñatvā ti paccatthikataḥ dassana paññatti

original: Kāmā hi aṅgārakāsūpamā maṁsapesūpamā pāvakakappā papātauragopamā ca.
analyzed: kāmā hi aṅgārakāsu upamā masapesūpamā pāvakakappā ca

original: “Tesaṁ satīmā”ti apacayapaññatti pahānāya, nikkhepapaññatti kāyagatāya satiyā, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa.
analyzed: tesam apacaya paññatti pahānāya nikkhepa paññatti kāya gatāya satiyāḥ bhāvanā paññatti maggassa

original: “Vinayāya sikkhe”ti paṭivedhapaññatti rāgavinayassa dosavinayassa mohavinayassa.
analyzed: vinayāya sikkhā iti paṭivedha paññatti rāga vinayassa dosa vinayassa moha vinayassa

original: “Jantū”ti vevacanapaññatti yogissa.
analyzed: jantu uti vevacana paññatti yogissa

original: Yadā hi yogī kāmā saṅgoti pajānāti.
analyzed: yadā hi yogī kāmā pajānāti

original: So kāmānaṁ anuppādāya kusale dhamme uppādayati, so anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya vāyamati.
analyzed: so kāmānam an uppādāya kusale dhamme uppādayati saḥ anuppannānam kusalānam dhammānam uppādāya vā āyamati

original: Ayaṁ vāyāmapaññatti appattassa pattiyā.
analyzed: ayam vā āyāma paññatti appattassa pattiyā

original: Nikkhepapaññatti oramattikāya asantuṭṭhiyā.
analyzed: nikkhepa paññatti oramattikāya asantuṭṭhiyā

original: Tattha so uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā vāyamatīti ayaṁ appamādapaññatti
analyzed: tattha saḥ uppannānam kusalānam dhammānam ṭhitiyā vāyamati iti ayaṃ appamāda paññatti

original: bhāvanāya, nikkhepapaññatti vīriyindriyassa, ārakkhapaññatti kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ,
analyzed: bhāvanāya nikkhepa paññatti vīriya indriyassa ārakkha paññatti kusalānam dhammānaṃ

original: ṭhitipaññatti adhicittasikkhāya.
analyzed: ṭhiti paññatti adhicitta sikkhāya

original: Tenāha bhagavā “yo dukkhamaddakkhi yatonidānan”ti.
analyzed: tena āha bhagavā yaḥ dukkham addakkhi yatonidānam ti

original: “Mohasambandhano loko,
analyzed: moha sambandhanaḥ

original: bhabbarūpova dissati;
analyzed: bhabba rūpaḥ uva dissati

original: Upadhibandhano bālo,
analyzed: upadhi bandhanaḥ

original: tamasā parivārito;
analyzed: tamasā parivāritaḥ

original: Assirī viya khāyati,
analyzed: assirī viya khāyati

original: passato natthi kiñcanan”ti.
analyzed: passataḥ na atthi kiñcananti

original: “Mohasambandhano loko”ti desanāpaññatti vipallāsānaṁ.
analyzed: moha sambandhanaḥ desanā paññatti

original: “Bhabbarūpova dissatī”ti viparītapaññatti lokassa.
analyzed: bhabba rūpaḥ uva dissati iti viparīta paññatti lokassa

original: “Upadhibandhano bālo”ti pabhavapaññatti pāpakānaṁ icchāvacarānaṁ, kiccapaññatti pariyuṭṭhānānaṁ.
analyzed: upadhi bandhanaḥ bālaḥ ti pabhava paññatti pāpakānaṃ icchā avacarāna kicca paññatti pariyuṭṭhānānaṃ

original: Balavapaññatti kilesānaṁ.
analyzed: kilesāna

original: Virūhanāpaññatti saṅkhārānaṁ.
analyzed: virūhanā paññatti saṅkhārāna

original: “Tamasā parivārito”ti desanāpaññatti avijjandhakārassa vevacanapaññatti ca.
analyzed: tamasā parivāritaḥ ti desanā paññatti avijja andhakārassa vevacana paññatti ca

original: “Assirī viya khāyatī”ti dassanapaññatti dibbacakkhussa, nikkhepapaññatti paññācakkhussa.
analyzed: assirī viya khāyati iti dassana paññatti dibba cakkhussa nikkhepa paññatti paññā cakkhussa

original: “Passato natthi kiñcanan”ti paṭivedhapaññatti sattānaṁ, rāgo kiñcanaṁ doso kiñcanaṁ moho kiñcanaṁ.
analyzed: passataḥ natthi kiñcananti paṭivedha paññatti sattāna rāgo kiñcanam doso kiñcanam moho kiñcana

original: Tenāha bhagavā “mohasambandhano loko”ti.
analyzed: tena āha bhagavā moha sambandhanaḥ

original: “Atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhataṁ, no cetaṁ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhataṁ.
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhata no ceta bhikkhave abhavissa a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhata

original: Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyetha.
analyzed: na yidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyetha

original: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhataṁ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyatī”ti.
analyzed: yasmā ca kho bhikkhave atthi a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhata tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyati iti

original: “No cetaṁ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhatan”ti desanāpaññatti nibbānassa vevacanapaññatti ca.
analyzed: no ceta bhikkhave desanā paññatti nibbānassa vevacana paññatti ca

original: “Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyethā”ti vevacanapaññatti saṅkhatassa upanayanapaññatti ca.
analyzed: nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyetha ati vevacana paññatti saṅkhatassa upanayana paññatti ca

original: “Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhatan”ti vevacanapaññatti nibbānassa jotanāpaññatti ca.
analyzed: yasmā ca kho bhikkhave atthi a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhatanti vevacana paññatti nibbānassa jotanā paññatti ca

original: “Tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyatī”ti ayaṁ vevacanapaññatti nibbānassa, niyyānikapaññatti maggassa, nissaraṇapaññatti saṁsārato.
analyzed: tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyati iti ayam vevacana paññatti nibbānassa niyyānika paññatti maggassa nissaraṇa paññatti sa sārataḥ

original: Tenāha bhagavā “no cetaṁ, bhikkhave, abhavissā”ti.
analyzed: tena āha bhagavā no ceta bhikkhave abhavissa ati

original: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “ekaṁ bhagavā dhammaṁ, paññattīhi vividhāhi desetī”ti.
analyzed: tena āha āyasmā mahākaccāyanaḥ ekam bhagavā dhamma paññattīhi vividhāhi deseti iti

original: Niyutto paññatti hāro.
analyzed: niyuttaḥ paññatti hāraḥ
